_sText:
*Version 3*
-Fog added
-Underground well path removed
-boats remodeled
-Second Village exit fixed
-2 Secrets fixed


*Version 2*
-Redesigned all the forest sections throughout the map (Daker and less cluttered)
-Second Village hold point should be easier to hold
-Well path hold point shouldn't glitch players through roof
-Outpost and dock radio call point changed to one generator on dock for final hold off
-Boat 1 leave time reduced to 60 seconds
-Boat 2 leave time reduced to 75 seconds
-Ocean water damage changed to 10,000
-2 secrets on map
